abilities.name: Untouchable Purity
abilities.text: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds.

abilities.name: One With the Warp
abilities.text: Once per battle, when this model’s unit declares a charge in the same turn it was set up as Reinforcements using the Deep Strike ability, add 3 to the Charge roll.

abilities.name: Sanctuary
abilities.text: While this model is leading a unit, each time an attack targets that unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Hammer Aflame
abilities.text: Each time this model’s unit is selected to fight, you can select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this model’s unit and roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if that unit has the Daemon keyword: on a 4-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6+, that enemy unit suffers D3+3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Might of Purity
abilities.text: While this model is leading a unit, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the characteristics of models in that unit and to any roll or test made for models in that unit (excluding modifiers to saving throws).

abilities.name: Master Strategist
abilities.text: Once per battle, one unit from your army with this ability can be targeted by a Stratagem for 0CP, even if another unit from your army has already been targeted by that Stratagem this phase.

abilities.name: Surge of Wrath
abilities.text: Once per battle round, in the Fight phase, one model from your army with this ability can use it before resolving its attacks. If it does, until the end of the phase, each time that model makes an attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll, you can re-roll the Wound roll and you can re-roll the Damage roll.

abilities.name: Heroism’s Favour
abilities.text: Each time you target this model with a Stratagem, it only costs 1CP to use, even if the CP cost is higher.

degredation.text: Each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Champion of the Order of Purifiers
abilities.text: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that unit’s Purifying Flame.

abilities.name: Foresight of the Prognosticars
abilities.text: Once per turn, the first time a saving throw is failed for this model, change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 0.

abilities.name: Exemplar of the Silvered Host
abilities.text: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, on a Critical Wound, the target suffers 1 mortal wound in addition to any normal damage.

abilities.name: Strands of Fate
abilities.text: The first time this model is destroyed, roll one D6 at the end of the phase. On a 2+, set this model back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with its full wounds remaining.

abilities.name: Empyric Amplification
abilities.text: While this model is leading a unit, Psychic weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

abilities.name: Focused Mind
abilities.text: Each time this model makes an attack with a Psychic weapon, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Ethereal Castigation
abilities.text: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Fights First ability.

abilities.name: Martial Fury
abilities.text: Each time this model makes a melee attack that targets a Character unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Sanctic Hood
abilities.text: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against Psychic Attacks.

abilities.name: Vortex of Doom
abilities.text: In your Shooting phase, you can select one enemy unit within 18" of and visible to this Psyker and roll one D6: on a 1, this Psyker’s unit suffers D6 mortal wounds; on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers 2D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers 2D6 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Awaken the Machine Spirit
abilities.text: In your Command phase, you can select one friendly Grey Knights Vehicle model within 6" of this model. Until the start of your next Command phase, each time that Vehicle model makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Omnissiah’s Blessing
abilities.text: In your Command phase, you can select one friendly Grey Knights Vehicle model within 3" of this model. That Vehicle model regains up to D3 lost wounds.

abilities.name: Techmarine
abilities.text: While this model is within 3" of one or more friendly Grey Knights Vehicle units, unless it is leading a unit, this model has the Lone Operative ability.

abilities.name: Words of Power
abilities.text: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Dread Bearing
abilities.text: While an enemy unit is within 6" of this model, each time that unit takes a Battle-shock or Leadership test, subtract 1 from that test.

abilities.name: Hammerhand
abilities.text: Each time a model in this unit makes a Charge move, until the end of the turn, melee weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

abilities.name: Ancient’s Banner
abilities.text: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer’s unit.

abilities.name: Narthecium
abilities.text: In your Command phase, you can return 1 destroyed model (excluding Characters) to the bearer’s unit.

abilities.name: Sanctifying Ritual
abilities.text: If you control an objective marker at the end of your Command phase and this unit is within range of that objective marker, that objective marker remains under you control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

abilities.name: Inner Fortitude
abilities.text: Each time an attack targets this unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of this unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Ancient’s Banner
abilities.text: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer’s unit.

abilities.name: Sanctity of Purpose
abilities.text: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll if this unit is below its Starting Strength, and add 1 to the Wound roll as well if this unit is Below Half-strength.

abilities.name: Personal Teleporters
abilities.text: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, if it is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6" as if it were your Movement phase. If it does, until the end of the turn, this unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

abilities.name: Astral Aim
abilities.text: In your Shooting phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [INDIRECT FIRE] ability, provided the target of that weapon is visible to one or more other friendly Grey Knights Psyker units.

abilities.name: Empyric Reprisal
abilities.text: This model is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.

degredation.text: Each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
